inclusion.criterion: Cluster of differentiation 2 (CD2)-expressing lymphoid malignancy, confirmed by pathology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory tests: Creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dL or creatinine clearance greater than or equal to 60 ml/min;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) greater than or equal to 1000/mm(3), platelet greater than or equal to 75,000/mm(3); unless impairment due to respective organ impairment by tumor.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No active symptomatic ischemic heart disease, myocardial infarction or congestive heart failure within the past year.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must not have a marked baseline prolongation of Q wave, T wave (QT/QTc) interval (e.g., demonstration of a corrected QT interval (QTc) interval >500 milliseconds (ms)).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) negative, because of the unknown effects of combined therapy with chemotherapy and an immunosuppressive agent on HIV progression.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent by the patient or patient's representative.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not pregnant or nursing, because of the unknown effects of dose-adjusted etoposide, prednisone, vincristine, cyclophosphamide, doxorubicin, and rituximab (DA-EPOCH-R) or siplizumab on the developing fetus and infant.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No serious underlying medical condition or infection that would contraindicate treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with central nervous system (CNS) involvement are eligible for treatment on this study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients less than 18 years of age will be excluded because siplizumab has not been given to minors in combination with chemotherapy.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 44-year-old female with PMH of PCOS, Obesity, HTN who presented with symptoms of cholecystitis and was found incidentally to have a large pericardial effusion. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
